sentences.en: Did a power failure cause the food to spoil and become malodorous in your fridge?
sentences.cn: 停电引起食物变坏,冰箱里异味横生,您有过这样的事 吗 ?

sentences.en: Malodorous gases require gas phase filtration prior to exhausting from irrigation tanks and pumping stations.
sentences.cn: 异味气体在排放到冲洗槽和泵站前需要气相过滤.

sentences.en: Visitors to Changsha would be to have malodorous'bean curd and other snack foods.
sentences.cn: 游客到长沙可以吃到臭豆腐,以及其他小吃.

words.tran_cn: 有恶臭的；令人极为反感的；不合法的
